movie_title: 12 Minutes of Japan Facts You (Probably) Didn't Know
introduction: I asked my Japanese friends for interesting lore about Japan and they gave me some pretty interestin

vocabulary.definition: firmly established and difficult to change
vocabulary.example: Bowing is so culturally ingrained in Japan that even visitors start doing it.

vocabulary.definition: sudden occurrences of something unwelcome, such as disease
vocabulary.example: Japan had some serious rabies outbreaks in the early 1900s.
The rise of job quitting agents in Japan is a significant social phenomenon.
The belief in lucky days like Taian in Japan is pervasive in the culture.

vocabulary.definition: the action of imbuing something with new life and vitality
vocabulary.example: The small-town revitalization project in Japan aimed to breathe new life into rural areas.
The reaction between copper ions and moisture in shoes helps remove odor, according to Japanese tradition.
